Properties.ProtectedString:
-- Made by SolarCrane
local RS = game:GetService('ReplicatedStorage') local RunService = game:GetService('RunService') local PlayersService = game:GetService("Players")
local Utility = require(RS:WaitForChild('Utility')) local Signal = require(RS:WaitForChild('Signal')) local CreateLocalWelder = require(RS:WaitForChild('LocalEquipWeld')) local MonsterData = require(RS:WaitForChild('MonsterData'))
local MonsterGearGui = require(RS:WaitForChild('MonsterGearGui'))
local LocalPlayer = PlayersService.LocalPlayer local Character = nil local PlayerGui = LocalPlayer:WaitForChild('PlayerGui')
local MonsterInfoGui = nil
local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = Tool:WaitForChild('Handle') local CompassGuiPrefab = Tool:WaitForChild('CompassSurfaceGui') local Equipped = false local MonsterCompassGui = nil
local MESH_ARM = 180288381 local MESH_COMPASS_COMPASS = 180288400 local MESH_COMPASS = 180288413
-- Speed is in degrees per second local CANT_FIND_TARGET_SPEED = 300 local ZERO_VECTOR = Vector3.new() local XZ_VECTOR = Vector3.new(1,0,1) CreateLocalWelder(Tool)
local MosterTargetType = nil
local MonsterContainer = workspace:FindFirstChild('MonsterContainer')
local CachedTarget = nil local LastCacheLook = 0 local function FindCompassTarget(cacheBust) MonsterContainer = MonsterContainer or workspace:FindFirstChild('MonsterContainer') if tick() - LastCacheLook > 2.5 or cacheBust then local nearestDistance = math.huge local nearestGuy = nil if MonsterContainer and LocalPlayer and LocalPlayer.Character and MosterTargetType and MosterTargetType.DisplayName then for _, child in pairs(MonsterContainer:GetChildren()) do if child:IsA('Model') and child.Name == MosterTargetType.DisplayName then local distance = LocalPlayer:DistanceFromCharacter(child:GetModelCFrame().p) if distance < nearestDistance then nearestDistance = distance nearestGuy = child end end end end if nearestGuy then CachedTarget = nearestGuy end LastCacheLook = tick() end
if CachedTarget and CachedTarget:IsA('Model') then return CachedTarget and CachedTarget:GetModelCFrame() end end
local function DestroyGui() if MonsterCompassGui then MonsterCompassGui:Destroy() MonsterCompassGui = nil end end
local function CreateGui() DestroyGui() local thisGui = CompassGuiPrefab:Clone() MonsterCompassGui = thisGui MonsterCompassGui.Enabled = true MonsterCompassGui.Adornee = Handle MonsterCompassGui.Parent = PlayerGui
local ArmLabel = MonsterCompassGui:FindFirstChild('Arm') spawn(function() local now = tick() local lastTick = now while thisGui and thisGui == MonsterCompassGui and Equipped do now = tick() if ArmLabel then if Character then local newTarget = FindCompassTarget() if newTarget then local humanoid = Utility.GetHumanoid(LocalPlayer) local torso = humanoid and humanoid.Torso
local torsoLookVector = (torso.CFrame.lookVector * XZ_VECTOR).unit local toTargetVector = ((torso.CFrame.p - newTarget.p) * XZ_VECTOR).unit local rotatedVector = CFrame.new(ZERO_VECTOR, torsoLookVector):vectorToObjectSpace(toTargetVector)
local theta = math.atan2(rotatedVector.z,rotatedVector.x)
-- Check for NaN if theta and theta == theta then ArmLabel.Rotation = math.deg(theta) end else ArmLabel.Rotation = ArmLabel.Rotation + CANT_FIND_TARGET_SPEED * (now - lastTick) end end end lastTick = now RunService.RenderStepped:wait() end end) end
local function OnEquip() Equipped = true Character = LocalPlayer.Character CreateGui() if not MonsterInfoGui then MonsterInfoGui = MonsterGearGui(true) MonsterInfoGui:SetName("Monster Compass") MonsterInfoGui.MonsterTypeSelected:connect(function(monsterInfo) MosterTargetType = monsterInfo MonsterInfoGui:Hide() FindCompassTarget(true) end) end MonsterInfoGui:Show() end
local function OnUnequip() Equipped = false Character = nil DestroyGui() if MonsterInfoGui then MonsterInfoGui:Hide() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquip) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequip)
